demo3.web

Class SwitchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo3.web.SwitchController

  • @Controller
 @Profile(value="no-auto-creation")
public class SwitchController
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple controller for enabling and disabling the SwitchableSimpleMappingExceptionResolver.

    • Method Detail

      • getProfiles

        @ModelAttribute(value="profiles")
public java.lang.String getProfiles()
        Must return the currently active profiles for the home page (index.html) to use.
        Returns:
        Currently active profiles.

      • enable

        @RequestMapping(value="/simpleMappingExceptionResolver/{action}")
public java.lang.String enable(@PathVariable(value="action")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String action,
                                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Enable the profile if action is "on".
        Parameters:
        action - What to do. Resolver is enabled if set to "ON" (case ignored).
        Returns:
        Redirection back to the home page.
